title: Provided also that this regulation shall also be applicable to all declared / Notified Gaothan under M
clause_text: Provided also that this regulation shall also be applicable to all declared / Notified Gaothan under M.L.R.C. whether shown on Regional Plan or not.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
